## Checklist

- [ ] Code is formatted with `cargo fmt`
- [ ] No Clippy warnings (`cargo clippy -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`cargo test`)
- [ ] CI passes (`make ci`)
- [ ] Public functions and structs are documented (`///`)
